name: Retrieve Channel Usage for valid CIF Key not having logged into Application

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API
And I have not located a customer

When I fetch the Channel Utilisation Details for CIF Key <cifKey>:
| cifKey |
| 0100000930020222000 |
Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: Retrieve the Channel Utilisation - Intenet/Phone/Mobile/Tablet etc - information for a customer

title: Retrieve Channel Usage for valid CIF Key not having logged into Application
